name: e-Sword

task.name: winetricks
task.app: mfc42 vcrun6 msls31 msxml3 msxml6 vb6run wsh57

content:
files:
- filename: https://www.e-sword.net/files/e-sword_1201_setup.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/e-Sword/e-Sword.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating 64bit Wine prefix.
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: mfc42 vcrun6 msls31 msxml3 msxml6 vb6run wsh57
    arch: win32
    description: Installing winetricks verbs
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing eSword...
    executable: filename
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
